AutofeExperimentConfiguration.title: A short description of struct
AutofeExperimentConfiguration.description: The configuration of the AutoFE experiment.

oss_bucket.title: oss_bucket
oss_bucket.description: The name of the OSS bucket.

oss_role_arn.title: oss_role_arn
oss_role_arn.description: The service-linked role for PAIAutoML. If this parameter is specified, AccessKey ID and Secret are not required.

odps_project_name.title: odps_project_name
odps_project_name.description: The name of the MaxCompute project.

odps_role_arn.title: odps_role_arn
odps_role_arn.description: The service-linked role for PAIAutoML. If this parameter is specified, AccessKey ID and Secret are not required.

output_config_oss_dir.title: output_config_oss_dir
output_config_oss_dir.description: The output path of the dynamic configurations.

label.title: label
label.description: The name of the label column of the input data.

data_source.title: data_source
data_source.description: The name of the data source.

aggregate_only.title: aggregate_only
aggregate_only.description: Specifies whether to perform only aggregate data analysis. If you specify false, the four operations are also performed.

reuse_results.title: reuse_results
reuse_results.description: Specifies whether to reuse the intermediate results.

workers.title: workers
workers.description: The number of workers to be used in AutoFE.

memory.title: memory
memory.description: The memory usage of each worker in the experiment.

cpu.title: cpu
cpu.description: The CPU usage of each worker in the experiment.

debug_mode.title: debug_mode
debug_mode.description: Specifies whether to enable the debug mode.

action.title: action
action.description: The operations of the experiment. Valid values: `fs_train`, `train`, `analyze`, `pipeline`, `selection`, and `transform`.

sample_size.title: sample_size
sample_size.description: The number of data samples. This parameter is needed when the data size is too large.

analyze_exp_id.title: analyze_exp_id
analyze_exp_id.description: The ID of the feature analysis experiment. This parameter is used only if data analysis is already done. If AutoFE is performed for the first time, this parameter is not required.

exclude_columns.title: exclude_columns
exclude_columns.description: The name of the column to be ignored. For example, the ID columns or other columns not relevant to feature engineering.

feature_selection.title: feature_selection
feature_selection.description: Specifies whether to use the results of feature selection for feature analysis.

selection_exp_id.title: selection_exp_id
selection_exp_id.description: The ID of the feature selection experiment.

pipeline_exp_id.title: pipeline_exp_id
pipeline_exp_id.description: The ID of the pipeline training experiment.

sample_ratio.title: sample_ratio
sample_ratio.description: The ratio of data samples. You can specify this parameter when the data size is too large.

filter_thresh.title: filter_thresh
filter_thresh.description: The filtering threshold of low frequency features.

skip_select.title: skip_select
skip_select.description: Specifies whether all original features are contained in the output.

iv_thresh.title: iv_thresh
iv_thresh.description: The information value threshold for feature selection. If the information value of a feature is lower than iv_thresh, the feature is filtered out. We recommend that you set this parameter to 0.02.

params_src_dst_filepath.title: params_src_dst_filepath
params_src_dst_filepath.description: The source and destination paths of params_config.

items.description: The source and destination paths. The values are strings separated by commas.

name.title: name of the computation platform
name.description: The name of the platform where the experiment is executed.

cmd.title: a list of commands to be executed
cmd.description: The list of commands to be executed on the background computing platform.

resume.title: resume
resume.description: Specifies whether to enable resume. For example, if the first line succeeds and the second line fails due to insufficient resources, you can enable resume to start from the second line.

metric_type.title: metric_type
metric_type.description: The metric type of the user evaluation trial. Valid values: summary, table, json, stdout.

items.description: Source of the metric. For example, an OSS file path or an SQL statement to obtain the metric from a MaxCompute table.

final_mode.title: final_mode
final_mode.description: Specifies how to calculate the final metric from the intermediate metrics. Valid values: final, best, avg.

metric_dict.title: metric_dict
metric_dict.description: The name and weight of metrics. Use this parameter if you need to consider multiple metrics at the same time. Note: The weight can be negative, and the sum of the weights is not necessarily 1.

source_list_final_mode.title: source_list_final_mode
source_list_final_mode.description: Specifies how to calculate the final metric if multiple metric sources are used. Optional. Default value: final_mode. Valid values: final, best, and avg.

role_arn.title: role_arn
role_arn.description: The service-linked role for PAIAutoML. If this parameter is specified, AccessKey ID and Secret are not required.

project_name.title: project_name
project_name.description: The name of the MaxCompute project.

role_arn.title: role_arn
role_arn.description: The service-linked role for PAIAutoML. If this parameter is specified, AccessKey ID and Secret are not required.

workspace_id.title: workspace_id
workspace_id.description: The ID of the PAI workspace.

yml_config.title: yml_config
yml_config.description: The run time configurations of the hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment.

trial_concurrency.title: trialConcurrency
trial_concurrency.description: The maximum number of concurrent trials.

max_trial_number.title: maxTrialNumber
max_trial_number.description: The maximum number of trials for an experiment. Note that the experiment may end before all trials are run.

name.title: name
name.description: The name of the HPO algorithm.

class_args.title: class_args
class_args.description: The parameters of the HPO algorithm.

name.title: name
name.description: The name of the class used for evaluation.

proportion.title: proportion
proportion.description: The proportion of the optimal value of this hyperparameter search to the historical value.

start_step.title: start_step
start_step.description: The step from which EarlyStop can be triggered.

moving_avg.title: moving_avg
moving_avg.description: Specifies whether to use the average moving of all history to determine EarlyStop.

search_space.title: search_space
search_space.description: The search space of the hyperparameter. The value is a JSON string.

url.title: url
url.description: The Webhook URL of the custom robot.

keyword.title: keyword
keyword.description: The custom keyword for the custom robot.

at_mobiles.title: at_mobiles
at_mobiles.description: The phone number of the group member to be @ mentioned. Phone numbers of non-members are de-identified.

at_user_ids.title: at_user_ids
at_user_ids.description: The userid of the member to be @ mentioned.

model_path.title: model_path
model_path.description: If you use the Service Edition, you can configure model_path to obtain the optimal model.

summary_path.title: summary_path
summary_path.description: If you use the Standalone Edition, you can configure a summary to view TensorBoard locally.

HpoExperimentConfiguration.description: The parameter struct of the HPO experiment configuration.

Description.example: This is an AutoML HPO experiment.

Accessibility.description:
The visibility of the code configuration. Valid values:

*   PUBLIC: The configuration is public in the workspace.
*   PRIVATE: The configuration is visible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.

ExperimentId.title: Id of the request
ExperimentId.description: The ID of the HPO experiment.

Code.description: The internal error code. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

Message.description: The error message. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

RequestId.description: The ID of the POP request.

AccessDeniedDetail.description: The information about the request denial.

additionalProperties.description: The information about the request denial..

ListHpoExperiments.summary: Queries information about a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment that meets specific requirements.

schema.description: The keyword of the name of the experiment.
The ID of the user who created the experiment.
The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.
The number of entries per page.

schema.example: Format: yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss or yyyy-mm-dd. Example: 2023-03-31 10:29:30
Format: yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss or yyyy-mm-dd. Example: 2023-03-31 10:29:30
CREATED, RUNNING, FINISHED, FAILED, EARLY_STOPPED, USER_CANCELED, SYS_CANCELED, WAITING, NO_MORE_TRIAL, UNKNOWN

schema.description:
The visibility of the workspace.

*   PRIVATE: The workspace is visible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.
*   PUBLIC: The workspace is visible to all users.
Specifies whether to include experiment configuration data in the response.
The filter that is used to sort experiments.

The sorting order. Specify this parameter together with the SortBy parameter. Valid values:

*   DESC: in descending order. This is the default value.
*   ASC: in ascending order.

items.description: List of tags. Query filter conditions. Up to 20 tags can be specified.

Key.description: The tag key of the resource

Value.description:
Tag value.
A tag value can contain up to 128 characters, and it cannot start with `aliyun` or `acs:`. It should not include `http://` or `https://`.
Up to 20 tag values are supported in a single request.

Code.title: 响应状态。
Code.description: The internal error code. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

Message.title: 响应错误信息。只在响应出错时被设置
Message.description: The error message. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

AccessDeniedDetail.description: The information about the request denial.

additionalProperties.description: The information about the request denial.

TotalCount.description: The total number of experiments returned.

Experiments.title: 符合搜索条件的实验列表。
Experiments.description: The experiments that meet the requirements.

items.description: The struct of the experiment data.

Creator.title: 实验创建者的id。
Creator.description: The ID of the user who created the experiment.

SearchSpace.title: 实验配置里的SearchSpace属性。
SearchSpace.description: The SearchSpace property in the experiment configuration.

Status.title: 实验状态。
Status.example: CREATED, RUNNING, FINISHED, FAILED, EARLY_STOPPED, USER_CANCELED, SYS_CANCELED, WAITING, NO_MORE_TRIAL, UNKNOWN

JobType.description: The type of the experiment. For HPO experiments, the value of this parameter is 1.

ConfigIni.description: The content of the trial.ini configuration file. The actual value of sensitive data such as an AccessKey pair is replaced with asterisks (\*).

ConfigYml.description: The content of the exp.yml configuration file.
ConfigYml.example:
experimentName: dlc_oss_mnist
experimentWorkingDirectory: ../expdir
searchSpaceFile: search_space.json
trialCommand: python3 -m hpo_tools.core.utils.run --config=./trial.ini
trialConcurrency: 1
maxTrialNumber: 4
tuner:
  name: TPE
  classArgs:
    optimize_mode: maximize
trainingService:
  platform: local
assessor:
  name: PAIAssessor
  classArgs:
    optimize_mode: maximize
    start_step: 2

GmtCreateTime.title: 实验创建时间。
GmtCreateTime.description: The time at which the experiment was created.

GmtModifiedTime.title: 实验数据最近更新时间。
GmtModifiedTime.description: The time at which the experiment data was last modified.

Accessibility.description:
The visibility of the workspace. Select the type of the task. Valid values:

*   PRIVATE (default): The workspace is visible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.
*   PUBLIC: The workspace is visible to all users.

Description.description: PUBLIC: The workspace is visible to all users.

TrialCount.description: The total number of trials of the experiment

TrialStatus.description: The information that contains the status of the trials and the trials in each state.

Deleted.description: Indicates whether the experiment is deleted.

ListHpoExperiments.title: ListHpoExperiments

GetHpoExperiment.summary: Queries the information about a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment, including the status and configuration of the experiment, and the status of its trials.

schema.title: A short description of struct
schema.description: The ID of the HPO experiment.

RequestId.description: The ID of the POP request.

Code.description: The internal error code. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

Message.description: The error message. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

AccessDeniedDetail.description: The details about the access denial.

ExperimentId.description: The ID of the HPO experiment.

Creator.description: The ID of the user who created the experiment.

SearchSpace.description: The configuration content of the search_space.json file.

Status.description: The status of the experiment. Valid values:

JobType.description: The type of the experiment. For HPO experiments, the value of this parameter is 1.

ConfigIni.description: The content of the trial.ini configuration file.

ConfigYml.description: The content of the exp.yml configuration file.
ConfigYml.example:
assessor:
  classArgs:
    optimize_mode: maximize
    start_step: 1
  name: PAIAssessor
debug: true
experimentName: maxcompute_kmeans_monitor
experimentWorkingDirectory: ../expdir
logLevel: debug
maxTrialNumber: 10
searchSpaceFile: search_space.json
trainingService:
  platform: local
trialCommand: python3 -m hpo_tools.core.utils.run --config=./config.ini
trialConcurrency: 2
tuner:
  classArgs:
    optimize_mode: maximize
  name: TPE

GmtCreateTime.description: The time at which the experiment was created.

GmtModifiedTime.description: The time at which the experiment data was last updated.

Accessibility.description:
The visibility of the experiment in the workspace.

*   PRIVATE: The experiment is visible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.
*   PUBLIC: The experiment is public in the workspace.

Description.example: This is experiment is for tune the LR of model.

TrialCount.description: The number of trials that are generated by the experiment.

TrialStatus.description: The status and number of the trials.

additionalProperties.description: The information that contains the status of the trials and the trials in each state.

HpoExperimentConfiguration.description: The configuration information of the experiment.

Deleted.description: Indicates whether the experiment is deleted.

GetHpoExperiment.title: GetHpoExperiment

ListHpoExperimentLogs.summary: Queries the content of a log file for a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment.

schema.title: A short description of struct
schema.description: The ID of the HPO experiment.
The name of the log. Valid values: nnimanager.log and dispatcher.log.
The page number. Page start from page 1. If you leave this parameter empty, all content in the log file is returned.
The number of entries per page. If you leave this parameter empty, all content in the log file is returned.

Message.description: The error message. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

AccessDeniedDetail.description: The details about the access denial.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entries returned.

Logs.description: The content of the log entry.

ListHpoTrials.summary: Returns all the trials for the specified experiment ID.

schema.description: The ID of the HPO experiment.
The page number to return. Pages start from 1. You can use this parameter to search for HPO experiments.

schema.title: 本次读取的最大数据记录数量
schema.description: The number of entries per page.

The order of specific fields of results in a paged query (ascending or descending). Default value: ASC.

*   ASC Ascend
*   DESC Descend

Code.description: The internal error code. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

Message.description: The error message. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

TotalCount.title: TotalCount本次请求条件下的数据总量，此参数为可选参数，默认可不返回
TotalCount.description: The total number of entries returned. By default, this parameter is not returned.

ExperimentId.description: The ID of the HPO experiment.

ParameterId.description: The ID assigned by the backend task to which the trial belongs.

Hyperparam.description: The hyperparameter values of the trial.

Status.example: UNKNOWN, RUNNING, WAITING, EARLY_STOPPED, SUCCEEDED, FAILED, USER_CANCELED, SYS_CANCELED

Model.description: The storage location of the model generated by the backend task to which the trial belongs.

Metric.description: The array of the results of the calculated metrics of the trial. The array includes one or more temporary values generated during the calculation and the final value.

JobMeta.description: The meta information of the backend task to which the trial belongs. The value is in the JSON string format.

FinalMetric.description: The final metric value calculated by the backend task after the trial is completed. The value is the value of the default key in the metric item of the FINAL type in the metric array.

GmtCreateTime.description: The time at which the trial was created. The time is in UTC.

GmtModifiedTime.description: The time at which the trial was last modified. The time is in UTC.

AccessDeniedDetail.description: The details about the access denial. This parameter is returned only if RAM permission verification failed.

additionalProperties.description: The details about the access denial.

GetHpoTrial.summary: Queries information about a trial in a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment.

RequestId.description: The ID of the POP request.

Code.title: 响应状态。
Code.description: The internal error code. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

Message.title: 响应错误信息。只在响应出错时被设置。
Message.description: The error message. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

AccessDeniedDetail.description: The details about the access denial.

additionalProperties.description: The details about the access denial.

ExperimentId.description: The ID of the HPO experiment.

Model.description: The storage location of the model generated by the backend task to which the trial belongs.

Hyperparam.description: The hyperparameter values of the trial.

ParameterId.description: The ID assigned by the backend task to which the trial belongs.

MetricName.description: The name of the metric. Not used.

Metric.description: The array of the results of the calculated metrics of the trial. The array includes one or more temporary values generated during the calculation and the final value.

JobMeta.description: The meta information of the backend task to which the trial belongs. The value is in the JSON string format.

FinalMetric.description: The final metric value calculated by the backend task after the trial is completed. The value is the value of the default key in the metric item of the FINAL type in the metric array.

GmtCreateTime.description: The time at which the trial was created. The time is in UTC.

GmtModifiedTime.description: The time at which the trial was last modified. The time is in UTC.

RestartHpoTrials.summary: Restarts failed trials in an hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment. The system extracts the configuration of the hyperparameters of a specific trial. If none of the trials that use this configuration are successful in the experiment, the system restarts trials by using this configuration.

schema.description: The request body. You must specify one of the TrialIds and TrialHyperParameters parameters. If you leave both parameters empty, no operation is performed on the server. If you specify both parameters, the TrialIds parameter prevails.

TrialIds.title: 需要重新运行的trial ids。不填则会包括所有符合重新运行条件的trial ids。
TrialIds.description: The IDs of the trials that you want to restart.

TrialHyperParameters.description: A new hyperparameter configuration of a trial. The system starts a new trial by using this configuration.

RequestId.description: The ID of the POP request.

Code.description: The internal error code. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

Message.title: 响应错误信息。只在响应出错时被设置。
Message.description: The error message. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

AccessDeniedDetail.description: The details about the failed permission verification.

additionalProperties.description: The details about the failed permission verification.

Results.title: (trial id: 重启状态) mapping。
Results.description: The information that contains the trial ID and the trial status.

ListHpoTrialCommands.summary: Queries the command output of a trial in a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment. A trial of an HPO experiment runs one or more commands in sequence based on the command set specified in the configuration. You can call this API operation to obtain the output of these commands.

schema.description: The ID of the HPO experiment.

ListHpoTrialCommands.title: ListHpoTrialCommands

Accessibility.description:
The visibility of the experiment in the workspace. Valid values:

*   PRIVATE: The experiment is visible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.
*   PUBLIC: The experiment is public in the workspace.

Tag.description: The list of tags. You can specify a maximum of 20 tags.

Message.description: The error message. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

Code.description: The internal error code. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

RequestId.description: The ID of the POP request.

Detail.description: The detailed information about the request error.

Code.description: Internal error code. Set only when the response has error.

Message.description: Response error message. Set only when the response has error.

Creator.description: User ID of the experiment creator

JobMeta.description: Basic information about the experiment running status, including the number of subtasks, URLs corresponding to each task, etc.

GmtModifiedTime.description: Latest update time of experiment data.

SelectedFeatures.description: Original features selected for feature engineering.

Accessibility.description:
Workspace visibility, possible values are:
- PRIVATE: Visible only to you and administrators within this workspace.
- PUBLIC: Visible to everyone within this workspace.
